title: Does Miss Weller do public speaking events?
text:
I assume you're referring to Frances Weller, the anchor on WECT. She makes appearances at various public events in the area. For more information you can reach out to her. Here's a link to her page on the WECT website: http://www.wect.com/story/12820366/frances-weller



We also have some information about her on MyReporter.com: http://www.myreporter.com/2009/02/frances-weller/
